page.title: 19ART AND CRAFTS
page.content: In the community at large there are many talented people.These people have often developed in artistic ways following on from many hours spent at evening classes doing such things as painting,pottery,embroidery,weaving & flower decoration.The skills often only come to light if one visits the home,an exhibition of paintings or other crafts at a church or evening school. { MIRFIELD ARTS CENTRE} The Centre has recently been opened in refurbished premises which previously housed Easthorpe C.E. School.Upstairs is a gallery in which photographs & paintings are on display.The rest of the building is set out in studios which are used mainly by young artists who have just left art school.Groups of children can go and see artists working with various media.
